quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Hey Oscar, big Will and Grace fan huh?

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: No. Everybody assumes I am. I always get them as gifts.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Dunder Mifflin is having our first own garage sale. Like many Americans, we realized we had a lot of things that we really didn't need. And 10 cents of every dollar is going into the party fund so we can throw parties for ourselves.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: People! Look alive. It's showtime. Doors open in 3...2...1.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Oh, yikes.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: It's cold Dwight. Just shut the door and let people come in the front.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: It's good that its cold it will drive business inside.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: The signs will drive people inside.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: The warmth will lure people inside.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Close it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: This is how business...

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Close it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I'm not closing the door.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Close it. [starts wrestling Dwight]

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Stop it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Just close it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Uh oh, looks like someone's sign is a little crooked. Uh, looks awful. Need a thumb tack?

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Sure.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Not so fast.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Schrute's are farmers by hobby, and traders by trade. Through the art of the swap, I will walk out of this garage sale with the finest item here.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I will trade you for the used candle.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Forget you.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Come on, its trash, like your sign, unless you have this.

quotes.speaker: Meredith
quotes.line: Fine, just give it.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: That's how it's done.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Woah, I love her. How much for that?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I uh... I actually don't know why I brought that because It's kind of priceless.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: 10 dollars.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Mhmm, no I paid 500 dollars for that.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Get lost.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Damn it.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That is how you do it.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: You know we don't have to sell that if you don't want to. If it's a problem with the neon I can have my neon guy take a look.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You know it's really more for a bachelor pad. I just want to get a fair price.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Well we could put it in storage... in case.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: In case... in case of what?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: You know... in case if something changes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I don't have an in case. Do you have an in case?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Nope.

quotes.speaker: Lady
quotes.line: How much for the slip and slide?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Get lost.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [on phone] Yes, hello Mr. Flax this is Michael Scott, your daughter's boss. I am calling because I am going to have to fire your daughter Holly because she is such a terrible employee. I'm just kidding. I'm kidding. I'm actually calling because I'm in love with her. I love your daughter, and I have for some time. And I would like to discuss my intentions with you... which are to ask her to marry me. And I was just hoping you would give me your approval. And this isn't a joke. So call me back, when you get this. And I look forward to speaking. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Are you serious? A half used candle? Get out of here Dwight. You're blocking my table with your giant body.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Oh, cause there's a huge line of people waiting in line who want your spinster chotskies.

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: Screw you man. People like my stuff.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: People like Ryan? Let me tell you about men like him. He comes over and you're like 'Hey baby let me light a candle' then you pull out this one half used and he's like 'Uh! Who else is she seeing? I better lock her down fast.'

quotes.speaker: Kelly
quotes.line: You can take my Helen Fielding collection.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: And the Jennifer Weiner collection.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oh my gosh, you have the Dallas board game?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yea when I was a kid I was on Dallas.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Really?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yea. When I was kid we missed our connecting flight and we spent the entire day on Dallas. Then we spent a week on Hawaii... I was in heaven.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: We should play it.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Well... there's no instructions.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: It's Dallas the game, we can figure it out.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yea.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: I'm pretty good at board games.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Well, shall we make it a little interesting?

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Sure.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: What is this?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: How did those get out? I'm sorry.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Professor Copperfield's Miracle Legumes?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: I was in Jamaica, and I got lost, and it was getting dark this one night and then out of nowhere with a cart and he's selling these. Dwight he's telling me things about myself that there's no way he could have known.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: That's a common swindlers trick.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Probably, probably. So I buy some, I turn the corner, I feel like an idiot, so I go back to get my money, he was gone.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: So you wanna sell me magic beans. [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Correction. I do not want to sell you Professor Copperfield's Miracle Legumes.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Nice try. No. Correction. Terrible try.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Michael called Dad?

quotes.speaker: Holly's Mom
quotes.line: Your friend Michael, yes. What's going on?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Um, I think I know. But I'll sound stupid if I'm wrong but is Dad there?

quotes.speaker: Holly's Dad
quotes.line: Holly?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Hi Dad.

quotes.speaker: Holly's Dad
quotes.line: There was a program on TV about India.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Um, ok. Did you connect with Michael?

quotes.speaker: Holly's Dad
quotes.line: Wanna watch it?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I... I'm not there Dad, I'm in Pennsylvania.

quotes.speaker: Holly's Dad
quotes.line: What are you doing there?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I live here. Um, can I talk to you about Michael?

quotes.speaker: Holly's Dad
quotes.line: I'll, I'll put your mother on.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No. No... no Dad.

quotes.speaker: Holly's Mom
quotes.line: Holly?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Mom, Dad can't seem to focus on a subject.

quotes.speaker: Holly's Mom
quotes.line: Don't you worry about him, he's got me.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Well who do you have?

quotes.speaker: Holly's Mom
quotes.line: I have your father. He's right here I'll put him on.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No. Mom?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Oh, which one is decaf?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: [looks out window] Michael! Michael!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hi.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Hi..  I was just coming out to see what you were doing and to maybe stop you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh, you know what, you have a siphon? I think I'm gonna run out of gas.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Why do you need more gas?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well, I'm writing a message.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Is it a good message or a bad message?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I'm asking Holly a question in fire.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Are you proposing!?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Maybe.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Wow.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hey you know what? I've got gas all over my hands and my shoes. Would you light it? Would you do the honors please?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yea. Yea no problem. [runs away]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Pam.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Yep.

quotes.speaker: Micahel
quotes.line: Could you light this please?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Michael, you've had two ideas today. And one of them was great. And the other one was terrible.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I am not in the mood for riddles pam.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: This is terrible.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, this is romantic.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: You know what? I'm gonna get a hose. Then we'll talk about it. Ok we'll figure it out. Be right back. Just stay there.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Free sample?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: My mom makes the best pesto in the world. And I always tell her 'Mom you should sell this, you'd make a fortune' and she always says 'No it's just for family.' Well finally I was like f*** it, I'll sell it so I'm like 'Mom, I need you to make a ton of pesto for a pesto party for all my friends' and she's like 'uh, ok' ... pesto party? Really? Anyway... she makes like a hundred bottles worth. It's so good. And Phyllis... just had that mom look I wanted.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: You got this kosher certified?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: No I meant like uh, it's cool, its kosher, it's all good.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Ryan, you have such an interesting mind. So creative. All these new business ideas and artistic projects. [laughs]

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Thank you. Whatcha got there?

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Oh, its just Stanley's old photo album. I'm thinking about throwing it in the garbage. I mean, why would I want some random black mans old photo album on my bookshelf. I'm not James Franco.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: things are going very well. I traded a thumb tack for Meredith's junk for Kelly's crap for Phyllis' garbage for Oscars trash for Stanley's garbage for Ryan's junk for Creed's garbage for a very cute squid that Erin happened to have.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Jim, put those away.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [pulls away beans] I'm really sorry. Pam must have put those out.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: just out of curiosity, what were the claims for those beans?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: They're legumes Dwight, and you're just gonna make fun of me, so why would I... You know what, this ends now. [crumples up beans, stomps on them, and throws them in a box]

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Hey Michael everyone's in the conference room.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Why?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: You called the meeting I don't..

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I did?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok. Thank you all for coming. I would like to talk to you all today about... recycling.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Michael.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: We are a family.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I could not have agreed with you more.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: And I've always believed that we should all be involved in everyone's personal lives, in a very major way.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yes. Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: So about this proposal thing...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, no, no. My minds made up I am not going to change my mind you can't talk me out of it.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Michael, she's perfect for you.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: She's the one.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: She's amazing. This is very exciting.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: So we just... we wanna help you plan the proposal so that it's safe and responsible and realistic and doable.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I had a great idea until you ruined it.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Wanna know how to do it? Here's how you do it. Take her out to dinner. Go down on one knee. If you are in costume, you did something wrong. If at any point you find yourself tying a ring to a dogs collar, stop, and look at yourself.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: [playing the Dallas board game] Hmm, I'm gonna play me a little ol' black mail card .

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Nice.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: And call a proxy meeting to take control of you and oil once and for all.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: No you cant do that. You cant play a black mail card and call a proxy meeting in the same turn.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Why not. Seems to me we're just making up rules cause somebody forgot to staple the rules to the inside of the game like a normal human being.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: And I'm gonna play this here share the wealth card.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Oooh.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Which entitles me to half of both of y'alls money so if you don't mind.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: no this card is from the wrong game this is from the game of life.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: It was in the box.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Well played.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Thank you.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: We must honorably adhere to the rules we are making up on the spot.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: No but that's not fair.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: Well that's Dallas.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Dallas indeed.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: What... Ryan, where did you get this picture? [a picture of Oscar on Ryans bottles of salsa]

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: My mom also makes the best salsa.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: This is your moms old stuff?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Yeah mostly.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: How's she doing?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: It didn't go down so easy but she's made some friends and it's already better than it was.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: How do you know when its time?

quotes.speaker: Phyllis
quotes.line: Uh I don't know if you ever know. And if you wait for the day when your parent to comes to you and says 'I cant take care of myself anymore' its never gonna happen. I have a box of bras under the table if you're interested.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Let me see.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Ok I think animals and proposals are out. Right Ryan didn't you read in one of your blogs that animals are out?

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Blogs are out but people are texting each other no more animals

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: How about this I throw a corpse dressed like me off of the roof, it hits the ground, the head pops off, this leads me to the line ' I lost my head when I fell in love with you.'

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: That's a guarantee.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: It's easy enough to get a corpse, you just go to a med school. I already have the ring.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Don't think you need the corpse then.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Heres the ring.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Holy s*** is that real?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah. I saved 3 years salary.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: No. [shakes head back and forth]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Is she not going to like that?

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: No she's going to love it so I think you can keep the proposal simple. You know like when Jim proposed. He just he got down on one knee and he told me that he loved me and he asked me to marry him and it was perfect.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Where was that.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: At a gas station. [oscar laughs]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: At a gas station?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Oh it was when she was working in New York so it was halfway between both of us.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That mush have been a surprise when... at the gas station you proposed.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: No it was really it was really sweet. It was raining and..

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh yea you didn't say that the weather was bad that sounds perfect. I want this to be an event that everyone talks about always and forever.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Totally reasonable.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I just... it's terrifying.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: She's not gonna say no.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: I know but I'm still scared I don't know why.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Cause it's a big deal. I mean.. I knew Pam was gonna say yes but I was still scared.

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: You were scared?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Yeah... it.s scary.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Get this... Kevin thought I was gonna sell my Bowflex for 200 dollars and I told him 'Dude this was a prop in my movie.'

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Look I need to talk to you.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok it's because we haven't sold anything. You know what? We just wait until the end of the day, people get desperate, and they're gonna pay anything.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I think I need to go home to Colorado. My dad isn't doing so well.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Oh ok. For how long?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I don't know.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Is he alright?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yeah.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: You ok?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yeah, yeah it's just you know I don't want to go home when he's on his death bed you know, I wanna be there when he's still my dad.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yeah, yeah well you definitely need to do that.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: And I want you to come with me. Now I know that's a lot to ask of a boyfriend..

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Ok.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: And I was thinking... you know maybe since given our last conversation that we're both ready... Michael Scott will you..

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, shhhhut it. Mhmm. Oh God. Nope, nope, nope.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Uh, what?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No. I am not going to be proposed to in the break room. That is not going to be our story. Mhm hm. Should have burned this place down when I had the chance.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Hey guys it's my turn.

quotes.speaker: Andy
quotes.line: You cant go, you're dead, I shot you 5 moves ago.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Yeah I told you, you can't shoot people.

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: I told you we're way past rules. We have been for some time now. We start having rules now, everything we built collapses.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: This is stupid and I want my money back. Where's the money?

quotes.speaker: Darryl
quotes.line: Yeah where is it?

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: Ok you know what? I am never ever playing board games with you two again.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: And that is Dallas. [shows money]

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Nice.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Not bad right. [swinging golf club]

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Can't really tell the...

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: [to Dwight] Nice.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I know right...[sees Jim's beans] what the?

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Oh my God.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: That... that's impossible.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: It is right. I mean, it's impossible.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: All right, I'll take them.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: They're probably worthless.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: Probably. [walks away with beans]

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Leave the telescope.

quotes.speaker: Dwight
quotes.line: I started with a thumb tack and traded my way to a telescope. But in a way the most valuable thing here wasn't the telescope at all. No, it was this... packet of beans.  So I traded the telescope for it. And I can just go buy another telescope.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Hey, how'd we do?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: 13 dollars.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That's great and we still have most of our stuff. Good.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Listen about earlier ...

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: No, no, no, no, lets not talk about that.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: It was wrong to put you in that position and... Michael you are my life now. I'm not going to Colorado.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Shhhh. Let's go on a little walk. You know what? I wanna show you some stuff.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: So this is one of my favorite places in the world.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Why?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: This is where Toby announced that he was going to Costa Rica. Happiest day of my life. Until the day you came to replace him. Let's go in here.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: This is where we first kissed.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: I remember.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: And this is where we first made love. Remember what I tried there?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Michael.. [they both laugh]

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Through these blinds is where I first saw you, and you had all these boxes, and I thought you were the prettiest mover I had ever seen. And I was sitting at this desk when I called you to tell you that I had herpes and that I was still in love with you and you said that it was over, and that you didn't love me. Thank goodness none of that was true. Including the herpes.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Yes.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: In-grown hair.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Right in here... this is where we first co-ran our meeting. Remember, obesity awareness?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Mh hmm.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: We saved a lot of lives that day. That's where you first met Michael Klump.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Oh, I say, I say, I say I sit on you!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: And right over there is where you found out that Meredith was prostituting herself for Outback steak. And I will never forget that you had the cutest look on your face because you couldn't believe it, you thought it was so wrong.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: And over here..

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: What happened here?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Well, nothing. Nothing really. I would just find an excuse to come here so I could stare at you through that window. This is what I'd do. [runs water through hand]

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Nice

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Let's go in here.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: [everyone in the office is standing in the kitchen with a lit candle] Hi guys.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: This is where our love faces its toughest test. After this, its just smooth sailing for the rest of our lives.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Holly, will you marry me?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Stanley
quotes.line: Marry me Holly.

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That guy's got more than he can handle as it is.

quotes.speaker: Oscar
quotes.line: Will you marry me?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That marriage would be a sham.

quotes.speaker: Gabe
quotes.line: Will you marry me?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Easy no.

quotes.speaker: Angela
quotes.line: Will you marry me?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: That would be hot. I would pay to see that.

quotes.speaker: Ryan
quotes.line: Will you marry me Holly?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: No.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Only one that I was kind of worried about.

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: [the area where Holly's desk is is filled with lit candles] This is where I fell in love with you. And this is where I ask you to marry me. It started with.. [fire sprinklers go on] Holly Flax, marrying me will you be?

quotes.speaker: Holly
quotes.line: Your wife becoming me will I. [everyone in the kitchen starts cheering, then enters annex]

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: That's awesome!

quotes.speaker: Pam
quotes.line: Congratulations!

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Congratulations!

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Thank you. So guys, guys, guys. We're moving to Colorado.

quotes.speaker: Kevin
quotes.line: All of us?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Yep.

quotes.speaker: Jim
quotes.line: Wait, what?

quotes.speaker: Michael
quotes.line: Holly has to go back to Colorado. I'm going with her. I'm leaving.
